body_html:
One question. If you manage to build a native Windows version of tfcompile with bazel, would generated static libraries be compatible with MSVC? If not, is there any way to generate C/C++ source code rather than static libraries so they can built and linked across platforms and compilers?

Thanks!

body:
One question. If you manage to build a native Windows version of tfcompile with bazel, would generated static libraries be compatible with MSVC? If not, is there any way to generate C/C++ source code rather than static libraries so they can built and linked across platforms and compilers?

Thanks!
